dcterms:description: A dataset containing 300 million records (35 million reshares and 265 million views) with 2250 webpages spreading in WeChat Moment (WM) in July 2016, focusing on the diffusion of content in a closed social network.
dcterms:title: WeChat Moment (WM) Dataset
